channel.title: display technology on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in display technology on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Japan Display Logo
Japan Display Inc., commonly called by its abbreviated name, JDI, is the Japanese display technology joint venture formed by the merger of the small and medium-sized liquid crystal display business units of Sony, Toshiba, and Hitachi. As of March 2014, JDI was one of the major display suppliers to Apple’s iPhone. Also, it was a key supplier to Nintendo Switch along with Sharp Corporation until 2017. As of 2020, JDI has development and production of three types of displays ongoing under its operation: LCD, OLED, and microLED.
You can download theJapan Displaylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Japan Display
item.description: Japan Display Inc., commonly called by its abbreviated name, JDI, is the Japanese display technology joint venture formed by the merger of the small and medium-sized liquid crystal display business units of Sony, Toshiba, and Hitachi. As of March 2014, JDI was one of the major display suppliers to Apple’s iPhone. Also, it was a key supplier to Nintendo Switch along with Sharp Corporation until 2017. As of 2020, JDI has development and production of three types of displays ongoing under its operation: LCD, OLED, and microLED.
